name: A Very VERY Annoying Game
description:
This game is fairly annoying... very VERY annoying. 

Use AD or the arrows to move left and right, up arrow or w is jump. Click or press space to dash at high speed in the direction of your mouse cursor. Also, R to restart (your gonna need it).

Use your movement and dash ability to move throughout levels while avoiding dangerous lava! Lighter coloured platforms are able to be dashed through. 

BUT WAIT! Be sure to keep an eye on your available dashes, because when you run out... Your doom is nye.

I made this in a matter of about 2 days so please report any bugs (theres probably a lot)

Thanks, and GOOD LUCK!
